Articles.Content:
I'm not very good at stuff like this, so I was wondering if I could get a patch made for my PCL program.

I want the center to be as close as possible to this spacecraft design with Kerbin behind it like it is orbiting the planet

On the top of the patch I want it to say PCL and on the bottom say Flying Far.

Thanks for the help, all the patches I try to make end as disasters.

Let me know if you want to tweak it or change something. I can give you the clean copy with no effects as well. PM for the .png

Edited August 19, 2015 by hellblazer

That's really good. Thanks

Edited August 26, 2015 by Voyager275
